name: RepairOrder2
description: Represents the current and past repairs or services that the customer has had. This is the second order.

sampleUtterances.utterance: Can you show the second repair order?
What is my second repair order?

plainTextMessage.value: To check for line items please type "Line Item 2."
The current status of your repair order is "COMPLETED,"  meaning you can come pick up your vehicle as soon as you have a chance! Would you like to check for opening/closing date and time? (Yes/No)
Open Date/Time - September 16, 2021 at 6:00 pm. Remember to come pick up your vehicle as soon as possible! To check for line items please type "Line Item 2."
